Document: # Rule E3: Rules regarding livestreaming Delta-V welcomes content creators and streamers to our community, but we have a few rules regarding livestreaming game servers. - While a stream delay is not necessary, it is highly recommended to have at least a 10 second delay. - Please let admins know you are streaming via the AHelp prior to doing so. - If your chat or viewers are in-game with you while also watching your stream, they are breaking our server rules. - Please do not coordinate with them and discourage this behavior if it is seen.
